definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: Take those keywords and add them to your preliminary list.
sentences.chinese: 把这些关键字都加入到你的候选名单中去。

sentences.english: The semantic synonym expansion mechanism is limited to expand simple keyword queries.
sentences.chinese: 语义同义词扩展机制仅限于扩展简单的关键字查询。

sentences.english: The compiler treats the inline expansion options and keywords as suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 编译器会将内嵌展开选项和关键字视同建议。
编程语言中每一个关键字都有其特殊的用途。

sentences.english: In this class the keyword def is being used as a local variable modifier.
sentences.chinese: 在这个类中关键字def被作为局部变量修饰符使用。

sentences.english: One of its columns contains a generated key that uniquely identifies each record.
sentences.chinese: 其中一列包含所生成的，唯一标识每个记录的关键字。

sentences.english: We want to be top 3 in the serps for all of our keywords.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望在我们的所有关键字的SERP前3名。

sentences.english: Step 6 – Type the keys that you want to use to bring up the emoticon.
sentences.chinese: 键入你想使用的关键字来说明图释。

sentences.english: Some key points in processing data flow are given, and theseareh cutting method is also proposed by auxiliary key word search.
sentences.chinese: 而且还提出了按辅助关键字查询的索引分割法。

sentences.english: Note that there is a keyword change.
sentences.chinese: 注意，关键字方面有一个变化。

sentences.english: One example of this is Website keyword searching.
sentences.chinese: 这种任务之一是网站关键字搜索。

sentences.english: It can search an HTML string for given keywords in the text.
sentences.chinese: 它可以搜索一个HTML字符串中指定关键字的文本。

sentences.english: Companies can also switch up their headlines to see which keywords get the most hits.
sentences.chinese: 公司还可以替换标题以得到哪些关键字最易获得点击。

sentences.english: Finally , I had him recalculate visitor value for each keyword group .
sentences.chinese: 最后，我对他重新为每个关键字组游客价值。

sentences.english: Click the "Accounts" tab to see influential accounts for that keyword.
sentences.chinese: 单击“帐户”选项卡，看到有影响力占该关键字。

sentences.english: Other than for assignment, statements are introduced by keywords.
sentences.chinese: 与赋值不同，语句是用关键字引入的。

definition: to search (a place)/to search (a database etc)
to reply/to recover/to return (to a previous condition)/Re: in reply to (email)
case insensitive/not distinguishing capitals from lowercase letters
pinyin: bu4 qu1 fen1 da4 xiao3 xie3
